attributes.action: Impliment a first amendment exactly as the Americans "The Right to Free speech"
attributes.additional_details: I believe parliament should introduce a first amendment to protect the right to express ones self "Free speech", and any law that infringes on this right should be nullified, and once implimented this law should never be changed or bypassed under any circumstances.we need this because Laws set out in the Magna Carta can be changed, overwritted or even manipulated by the government. Having this right will help provide a free, fair and intelligent scociety.
attributes.background: Parliament shall make no law respecting an establishment of religion, or prohibiting the free exercise thereof; or abridging the freedom of speech, or of the press; or the right of the people peaceably to assemble, and to petition the Government for a redress of grievances.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701561
